message.body: Hey!! How's sd? Are you free to skype at all today or tomorrow?
Ahahaha why were you up at 5 am? Well my time. And tmrw I should be! How are you?
I'm in Paris and forgot about the time change! I was afraid I woke you up after I'd sent it haha. Anyway I'm great!! The sister thing is a disaster, I'll
fill you in on that when we skype, but I'm seeing Gabriel tomorrow night! Is Johnny back from camping yet?
Ahhh are you excited to see him???? And he comes back in a few hours, I gotta go pick him up. Ugh to the sister thing, if it's any consolation the whole parent thing ain't so great either
I'm so fucking excited I've been walking around smiling like a goon for the past few hrs. Have fun with johnny! And that sucks about your parents, I wann
a hear more about it tomorrow if you want to talk. My sister went to the hospital on Friday and she's delirious on all these meds now calling my parents
"mommy" and "daddy". She didn't get to go to Paris and my dad stayed back with her so Xmas should be pretty weird this yr
Oh my god Jesus, meds for what? And yeah same here, about Xmas. Def not what I was expecting. But ahh that's si cute, I hope it goes well with him!
Sleeping pills and antidepressants, I don't even know. Thanks though! Can't wait to skype w/ you :)
Ah gnarls. But for sure, how many hours are you ahead?
Ps desperate housewives just skipped five years...the fuck
I know so weird!!! Gaby randomly gets fat haha. My friend showed me around the american university of paris today and I met a ton of people from san dieg
o. Reminded me of you guys :)
Awww that's awesome!! Hehe sd is awesome. And yeah she is it's so weird!
It's really weird since she randomly gets hot again. Watch out for the bday cake/car/running episode with juanita. So funny! It should be coming up for you
Haha ojay, this is the first one from the five year skip. And god this whole deal is so odd!
Yeah especially with lynette's kids! The whole thing is insanely weird but at least susan and mike are together
Susan and mike aren't together right now. And yeah they're kids are so big and such!
Oh riiiight susan's with that painter. I kinda liked him. But I know it's so weird seeing the twins at that age! It gets pretty funny with them
Yeah seriously, he's kinda hot bit I wanna know what happened. And yeah they are, and Tom like wants to be with them
And soon Tom will end up going to college with them haha. You'll find out what happened soon though! Pay attention to everything w/ Edie and Dave (who is
really fucking creepy)
Yes he is! For real! And seriously? Ahaha I totally just saw the Juanita running shit
Haha I love it I'm gonna do that to my kids someday. What's up with Celia though? Most useless character other, she never says a word!
Idk who Celia is yet. I like Katherine though.
She's juanita's sister. And yeah the katherine stuff is good. This must be after the season with dylan and the armoire season, right? Btw girl named dyla
n and guy named dana, the writers need to get their shit together
Yeah for real, Tom and Lynette are funny, I wish they didn't break up. But yeah Dave is such a creep.
Yeah there was never any reason for them to split up, I was really bummed out when they did that. Is Bree dating Megan Fox's husband yet?
No I don't know who she's with right now. Ugh why do they split up?? Stupid stupid
I know! They make it seem like they started fighting but they've always fought. That's pt of why their relationship worked in the first place. Dumbass writers
Yeah seriously, they always made up well, stupid they just ran out of ideas
Yeah Jane needs to go away and then they can get back together!!
Yesssss please ughh they suck si hard! Ps what's up with Edie and the guy?
Is he crazy? Meds?
Oh my god who's the one person he wants to kill?
Crazy and meds, but there's a twist ending a the end of the season.
Mike!
Oh of course, everyone is after mike haha. Why so? Hehehehhe I love desperate housewives
He thinks mike killed his daughter in a hit and run but it turns out susan was the one who was driving, so his revenge plan gets all twisted. And I'm sad
, this season's the one where edie dies :(
Yeah I figured it was. And oh my god wow Jesus he's so sketch
Yeah he talks so weird. And the albino look really isn't working for him either
Yeah def not, this whole deal is so odd. "we can be happy here" yeah freak
Yeah and then he tries to befriend all the husbands and they all hate him and think he's psycho, it's pretty funny
Jesus Christ, this is so weird hahah. He's such a paycho
Haha I know, he's way too sketchy. Hate him and Edie together too, no chemistry
Yeah they really don't, but oh my god I love Andrew. "I just heard the milk o bad, I'll be back"
Yeah his sense of humor is definitely one of the best on the show!
Yesss I love him, he's si great! And I feel like mike and the painted being friends won't end well
